name: Tetris (itch) (ArtinMolaeiForouhar)
description:
This game follows the general style of most Tetris games. The controls are relatively the same and can be found in the how to play section of the game (accessible through the main menu).  Every player begins at level 1 and can increase their level by clearing lines. For every 5 lines cleared  the player's level is increased by 1 until they reach level 20. With every increase in level, there is a slight increase in game speed, and the number of points rewarded for clearing a line is also increased. 

Please inform me if there are any bugs or issues with the game, or if you have any suggestions you would like to make :)
